# Psychic Sensitivity (Feat)
## Overview
You unlock the secrets of the occult world.

**Benefit:** You gain access to occult skill unlocksfor any skills in which you have ranks. If you have no ranks in the appropriate skill, you canâ€™t use the occult skill unlock, even if that skill can be used untrained.

**Normal:** You must have the ability to cast psychic spells in order to use occult skill unlocks.

**Source:** Occult Adventures, pg. 138
